item.title: Re: Ally Tags + Team List
item.content:encoded:
I agree, but we need to strike a careful balance here. Too much information presented at once and it becomes near impossible to navigate sometimes.

Regarding tags. My understanding is that tags can only be 1 word at a time. So you can do "Season2" but not "Season 2". Keeping that in mind, I think we can start adding the following tags:

  • aa-rank (attached to all AA Rank missions)
  • a-rank (attached to all A Rank missions, including Reaper missions)
  • b-rank (attached to all B Rank missions, including Reaper missions)
  • c-rank (attached to all C Rank missions, including Reaper missions)
  • d-rank (attached to all D Rank missions, including Reaper missions)
  • s-rank (attached to all Special missions)
  • lvl2 (attached to all level 2 allies)
  • lvl3 (attached to all level 3 allies)
  • Reaper (attached to all things reaper related)
  • season2 (attached to all things available only in season 2)
  • Trade (attached to all things related to the Trade)
  • gen (attached to all allies, jutsu, items, and missions which involve genjutsu)
  • nin (attached to all allies, jutsu, items, and missions which involve ninjutsu)
  • tai (attached to all allies, jutsu, items, and missions which involve taijutsu)

I can't think of a good way to involve strength, range or level bonuses that wouldn't be overly complicated.

Regarding the team bonuses, I would like to do that, but in a way that's not information overload. Perhaps we can link to a copy of the team list with total bonuses instead of the team bonus? So something like: team:total-bonus which would have listings like:

  • Detention Bonus! - Mr. Smith + Timmy - (Total Bonus: -2 Strength, +20% XP, +40% AP)

Thoughts?

item.title: Ally Tags + Team List
item.content:encoded:
We should get into the habit of tagging allies with more tags than just "Ally" or such. I was thinking we could add info such as "Season X Ally", "Jounin Ally", "Taijutsu Strength Ally", and so on. From this people could go into tag lists and get info on a certain group of allies. That way people who are interested in only a certain aspect of allies can find what they want. It is unfortunate that this is not mediawiki as in that case we could add some nice scripts to make life easier in this respect, something I don't think wikidot can do.

Also, for teams we should probably do something like:

  • Detention Bonus! - Mr. Smith + Timmy - (Team Bonus: +2 Levels!) (Total Bonus: -2 Strength, +20% XP, +40% AP)

Since I don't have all the character bonuses memorized (yet) it gets really annoying having to actually click on each team to find the total team bonus.
